alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight and east central Southampton Counties and the City of Franklin through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sedley, or near Courtland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rain 2 to 3 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding of roads and low lying areas can be expected. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Windsor, Courtland, Hunterdale, Sedley, Carrsville, Vicksville, Berlin, Indika, Collosse, Dory, Lees Mill, Walters, Boaz, Burdette and Story. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
